participant_1.background:
I enjoy exercising and try to work out as often as I can, but it can be hard to find the time, especially with my night shift schedule.
i have a set of identical twin brothers.
I have never been arrested, but I sometimes need to be alone to clear my head.
i enjoy reading and cooking.
I am a female in my early 20s.

participant_2.background:
I remember singing in my bedroom as a kid and feeling like I could do anything.
i am a younger guy.
I believe in a progressive tax system, which means that people with higher incomes pay a higher percentage of their income in taxes than people with lower incomes
i am a digital artist.
i despise sweet potatoes.

content.text: Hi there!
Hello!
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to sing and play games.
That's cool! I like to exercise and read. Do you have any hobbies?
I'm into digital art!
That's so cool! I've always wanted to try that.
It's a lot of fun! Do you have any siblings?
I have a set of identical twin brothers.
That's awesome! I have a younger brother.
I've never been arrested, but I sometimes need to be alone to clear my head.
I've never been arrested either, but I can definitely relate to needing some alone time.
I have night shift so it can be hard to find the time to exercise, but I try to make it work.
I understand that. I usually stay up late, so I have to wake up early to get my work done.
What do you think of a progressive tax system?
I think it's a good idea. It ensures that everyone pays their fair share of taxes.
I agree. I think it's important to make sure everyone has a chance to succeed.
I think so too. That's why I love digital art! It's a way for everyone to express themselves.
That's a great point! I love that it's so accessible.
Me too! I think it's a great way to connect with people
